import styles from 'blog-post.module.css';

class BlogPostTemplate extends React.Component {

  render() {
    const post = this.props.data.markdownRemark

    return (
      <Layout>
        <h1 className={styles.blogTitle}>Takumon Blog</h1>
        <article>
          <h1 className={styles.postTitle}>{post.frontmatter.title}</h1>
          <div className={styles.postContent} dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{ __html: post.html }} />
        </article>
      </Layout>
    )
  }
}

export default BlogPostTemplate

export const pageQuery = graphql`
  query($slug: String!) {
    markdownRemark(fields: { slug: { eq: $slug } }) {
      html
      frontmatter {
        title
      }
    }
  }
`

import styles from 'blog-post.module.css';
import Post from '../components/post';

class BlogPostTemplate extends React.Component {

  render() {
    const post = this.props.data.markdownRemark

    return (
      <Layout>
        <h1 className={styles.blogTitle}>Takumon Blog</h1>
        <Post post={post} />
      </Layout>
    )
  }
}

export default BlogPostTemplate

  query($slug: String!) {
    markdownRemark(fields: { slug: { eq: $slug } }) {
      html
      frontmatter {
        title
      }
    }
  }
`

const THEME_PREFIX = 'gatsby-blog-component-replacement-theme--component'
const RELATIVE_DIR_PATH_OF_REPLACEMENT_COMPONETS = `./src/components/${THEME_PREFIX}`

exports.onCreateWebpackConfig = ({ actions, store }) => {

  // ã‚¨ã‚¤ãƒªã‚¢ã‚¹ã‚’ä½œæˆã™ã‚‹
  const userComponents = fs
    .readdirSync(path.resolve(RELATIVE_DIR_PATH_OF_REPLACEMENT_COMPONETS))

  // ã‚¨ã‚¤ãƒªã‚¢ã‚¹è¨­å®šã§ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãŒä½œæˆã—ãŸã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆã‚’å…ˆã«å®šç¾©ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã§
  // ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãŒä½œæˆã—ãŸã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆã‚’å„ªå…ˆçš„ã«èª­ã¿è¾¼ã‚€ã‚ˆã†ã«ã™ã‚‹
  actions.setWebpackConfig({
    resolve: {
      alias: {

        [THEME_PREFIX]: path.join(__dirname, './src/components'),
      },
    },
  })
}


// ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãŒsrc/pagesæœªä½œæˆã®å ´åˆã«ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ã«ãªã‚‹ã®ã‚’é˜²ããŸã‚ã€ç„¡ã‘ã‚Œã°ä½œæˆã™ã‚‹
// RELATIVE_DIR_PATH_OF_REPLACEMENT_COMPONETSã‚‚åŒæ§˜
exports.onPreBootstrap = ({ store }) => {
  const { program } = store.getState()

  const pageDir = `${program.directory}/src/pages/`
  const componentDir = `${program.directory}/src/components/`
  const replaceComponentDir = `${componentDir}/${THEME_PREFIX}/`

  mkdir(pageDir)
  mkdir(componentDir)
  mkdir(replaceComponentDir)
}

function mkdir(path) {
  if (!fs.existsSync(path)) {
    fs.mkdirSync(path)
  }
}

const TARGET_POS = ['åè©', 'å‹•è©', 'å½¢å®¹è©']

å˜ã«äº‹å®Ÿã«ä½¿ç”¨æ–¹ã¯ã©ã†ã‹ãã®å¿œç”¨ãŸãªã„ã§ã‚‚ãŒæ€ã„ã¦ãªã‚‰ãªã„ãŒã‚‚ç™ºå±•æ€ã„ã†ã¹ãã¦ã€
...

// è¾æ›¸æ ¼ç´ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒ€ãƒ‘ã‚¹
const DIC_URL = '/dict'

// WordCloudã®æƒ…å ±ã¨ã—ã¦æŠ½å‡ºã™ã‚‹å“è©ï¼ˆåŠ©è©ã€åŠ©å‹•è©ãªã©ã¯æ„å‘³ãŒãªã„ã®ã§æ‹¾ã‚ãªã„ï¼‰
const TARGET_POS = ['åè©', 'å‹•è©', 'å½¢å®¹è©']

// kuromoji.jsã®è§£æçµæœã®å€¤ã§ç‰¹ã«å€¤ãŒãªã„å ´åˆã¯ä»¥ä¸‹ã®æ–‡å­—ãŒè¨­å®šã•ã‚Œã‚‹
const NO_CONTENT = '*'

class App extends React.Component {

  // kuromoji.jsã«ã‚ˆã‚‹å½¢æ…‹ç´ è§£æã¯éåŒæœŸãªã®ã§
  // è§£æçµæœã¯stateã®ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ‘ãƒ†ã‚£ã¨ã—ã¦ã‚³ãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ©ã‚¯ã‚¿ã§åˆæœŸåŒ–ã—ã¦ãŠã
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.state={
      dataForD3Cloud: [],
    }
  }

  componentWillMount() {
    // è¾æ›¸ã‚’èª­ã¿æ··ã‚“ã§ãƒˆãƒ¼ã‚¯ãƒŠã‚¤ã‚¶ãƒ¼ï¼ˆå½¢æ…‹ç´ è§£æã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã®é–¢æ•°ï¼‰ã‚’ç”Ÿæˆ
    kuromoji.builder({ dicPath: DIC_URL }).build((err, tokenizer) => {
      if(err){
        console.log(err)
        return
      }

      // ãƒ†ã‚­ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’å¼•æ•°ã«ã—ã¦å½¢æ…‹ç´ è§£æ
      const tokens = tokenizer.tokenize(text)

      // è§£æçµæœã‹ã‚‰å˜èªã¨å‡ºç¾å›æ•°ã‚’æŠ½å‡º
      const dataForD3Cloud = tokens
        // posï¼ˆå“è©ï¼‰ã‚’å‚ç…§ã—ã€'åè©', 'å‹•è©', 'å½¢å®¹è©'ã®ã¿ã‚’æŠ½å‡º
        .filter(t => TARGET_POS.includes(t.pos))
        // å˜èªã‚’æŠ½å‡º(basic_formã‹surface_formã«å˜èªãŒå­˜åœ¨ã™ã‚‹)
        .map(t => t.basic_form === NO_CONTENT ? t.surface_form : t.basic_form)
        // [{text: å˜èª, value: å‡ºç¾å›æ•°}]ã®å½¢ã«Reduce
        .reduce((data, text) => {
          const target = data.find(c => c.text === text)
          if(target) {
            target.value = target.value + 1
          } else {
            data.push({
              text,
              value: 1,
            })
          }
          return data
        }, [])
      
      // åŠ å·¥ã—ãŸè§£æçµæœã‚’stateã«ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆ
      this.setState({dataForD3Cloud})
    })
  }

  render() {
    // ç•¥
  }
}

export default App;

export default new Vuex.Store({
  state: {
    pagination: {
      page: 1,
      rowsPerPage: 20,
      sortBy: 'id',
      descending: false,
    },
  },

  getter: {
    getPagination: state => state.pagination,
  },

  actions: {
    SAVE_PAGINATION({ commit }, payload) {
      const {
        page,
        rowsPerPage,
        sortBy,
        descending,
      } = payload;

      commit('savePagination', {
        page,
        rowsPerPage,
        sortBy,
        descending,
      });
    },

    SAVE_PAGINATION_PAGE({ commit }, payload) {
      const { page } = payload;
      commit('savePaginationPage', page);
    },
  },

  mutations: {
    savePagination(state, pagination) {
      state.pagination = pagination;
    },
    savePaginationPage(state, page) {
      state.pagination.page = page;
    },
  },
});

import Vue from 'vue';
import Vuex from 'vuex';
// å€‹ã€…ã®ãƒ¡ãƒƒã‚»ãƒ¼ã‚¸è­˜åˆ¥ã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã®idæ¡ç•ªç”¨ã«ä½¿ã†
import uuidv4 from 'uuid/v4';

Vue.use(Vuex);


export default new Vuex.Store({

  state: {
    messages: [],
  },

  getters: {
    // ãƒ¡ãƒƒã‚»ãƒ¼ã‚¸ãŒ1ã¤ã‚‚ãªã„å ´åˆã¯Snackbarã‚’è¡¨ç¤ºã—ãªã„
    isShow: state => state.messages.legth === 0,
    getMessages: state => state.messages,
  },

  actions: {
    /**
     * Snackbarã«ãƒ¡ãƒƒã‚»ãƒ¼ã‚¸(è¤‡æ•°æŒ‡å®šå¯)ã‚’è¡¨ç¤ºã™ã‚‹
     */
    ADD_MESSAGES({ commit }, payload) {
      commit('addMessages', payload);
    },

    /**
     * æŒ‡å®šã—ãŸãƒ¡ãƒƒã‚»ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚’Snackbarã‹ã‚‰å‰Šé™¤ã™ã‚‹
     */
    REMOVE_MESSAGE({ state, commit }, payload) {
      commit('removeMessage', payload);
    },
  },

  mutations: {

    addMessages(state, payload) {
      // ãƒ¡ãƒƒã‚»ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚’ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚¢ã«åŠ ãˆã‚‹éš›ã«ã€å€‹ã€…ã®ãƒ¡ãƒƒã‚»ãƒ¼ã‚¸ãŒè­˜åˆ¥ã§ãã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«idã‚’åŠ ãˆã‚‹
      state.messages = [...state.messages, ...payload.messages.map(m => Object.assign(m, { id: uuidv4() }))];
    },

    removeMessage(state, payload) {
      const { id } = payload;
      state.messages.forEach((v, index) => {
        if (v.id === id) {
          state.messages.splice(index, 1);
        }
      });
    },
  },
});

<template>

    å…¨ã¦ã®ãƒ¡ãƒƒã‚»ãƒ¼ã‚¸ãŒæ¶ˆãˆãŸã‚‰å¤§æ ã‚’æ¶ˆã™
    å¤§æ ã‚’æ¶ˆã™å‡¦ç†ã¯Storeã«å®Ÿè£…ã™ã‚‹
  -->
  <v-snackbar
    v-model="isShow"
    color="white"
    :timeout="0"

    auto-height
  >
    <!-- ãƒ¡ãƒƒã‚»ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚’ç¸¦ä¸¦ã³ã«ã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚divã‚¿ã‚°ã§ãƒ©ãƒƒãƒ—ã™ã‚‹ -->
    <div style="margin: -14px auto; width: 100%;">
      <div style="margin: 0 -24px">
        <template v-for="(message, index) in getMessages">
          <snackbarMessage
            :key="message.id"

<script>
import { mapGetters, mapActions } from 'vuex';
// ãƒ¡ãƒƒã‚»ãƒ¼ã‚¸è¡¨ç¤ºç”¨ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆ
import snackbarMessage from './snackbar-message.vue';

export default {

<script>

  mounted() {
    // ãƒ¡ãƒƒã‚»ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆãŒãƒã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆã•ã‚ŒãŸæ™‚ç‚¹ã‹ã‚‰ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆé–‹å§‹
    this.setTimeout();

  methods: {

    setTimeout() {

      // ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ ã‚¢ã‚¦ãƒˆæ™‚é–“ãŒè¨­å®šã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹å ´åˆã¯
      if (timeout) {
        // æŒ‡å®šæ™‚é–“å¾Œã«removeã‚’å‘¼ã³å‡ºã™
        this.activeTimeout = window.setTimeout(() => {

      }
    },

    // è¦ªã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆã«removeã‚’ç™ºç«
    remove() {

  },
};
</script>
